<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
LEGAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/need-know-elizabeth-holmess-trial-starts-today?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Can’t Fake It ’Til You Make It in the Courtroom
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/need-know-elizabeth-holmess-trial-starts-today?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Theranos' Edison machine smoking with cracked screen" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=447 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/wnqrlUsg38l8sqcWMi/giphy.gif?cid=790b7611676244cc2d5d769553cfe73a113c32838f0da11a&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Theranos' Edison machine smoking with cracked screen" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/wnqrlUsg38l8sqcWMi/giphy.gif?cid=790b7611676244cc2d5d769553cfe73a113c32838f0da11a&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g">
<!--<![endif]-->
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Let’s welcome back our oldest friend: a celebrity trial. Jury selection <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/08/30/tech/elizabeth-holmes-theranos-trial/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">begins</a> today for the criminal fraud trial of Elizabeth Holmes, the founder of shuttered Silicon Valley biotech startup Theranos. Holmes and her ex-boyfriend/business partner (we’ll unpack that in a minute) Ramesh “Sunny” Balwani could face up to 20 years in prison for perpetrating one of the biggest startup frauds in decades.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Here’s a quick timeline for everyone who was too young or busy in the aughts: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">2003:</strong></span><span> At the age of 19, Elizabeth Holmes dropped out of Stanford and started Theranos with the goal of revolutionizing blood testing.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">2015</strong></span><span>: Theranos reached a $10 billion valuation by promising to perform 240+ tests with a single finger prick. Holmes’s net worth also grew to $4.5 billion, good enough for No. 1 on the Forbes list of America’s Richest Self-Made Women.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">October 2015:</strong></span><span> The WSJ started digging around the company and published a bombshell </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/theranos-has-struggled-with-blood-tests-1444881901?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">investigation</a></span><span> into Theranos, claiming that the company’s linchpin machine couldn’t really do what was promised.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">From there, investors started suing for fraud, the government yanked the company’s blood-testing license, and in September 2018, the SEC dissolved Theranos. Holmes was left with nothing but her black turtlenecks, two counts of conspiring to commit wire fraud, and 10 counts of federal wire fraud.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Holmes’s defense will try to prove that sure, maybe she ran a highly lucrative scam for over a decade, but she didn’t <em>know</em> it was a scam at the time.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Her legal strategy is basically to throw her former partner under the bus. Her defense </span><span><a href="https://www.npr.org/2021/08/28/1031961327/elizabeth-holmes-theranos-trial-boyfriend-balwani-emotional-sexual-abuse?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">alleges</a></span><span> that emotional and sexual abuse by Balwani impacted her state of mind during the time of the fraud. Balwani’s lawyers called the claims “deeply offensive.”</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> Holmes started Theranos at a time when venture capitalists were throwing money at young, public-facing tech founders who used the word “disrupt” a lot. The downfall of Theranos may have <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2021/aug/30/elizabeth-holmes-trial-theranos-silicon-valley?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">briefly scared</a> investors into looking closer at pitch decks, but it may take more than a conviction to change the Valley’s entrenched “fake it ’til you make it” mindset.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Fall into a Theranos rabbit hole:</strong> The WSJ reporter who broke the story, John Carreyrou, wrote a riveting book about the fraud called <a href="https://bookshop.org/books/bad-blood-secrets-and-lies-in-a-silicon-valley-startup/9780525431992?aid=9879&listref=brew-s-bookshelf" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Bad Blood</em></a>. You can also listen to a <a href="https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bad-blood-the-final-chapter/id1575738174?mt=2&ls=1&cc=us&id=1575738174&urlDesc=%2Fbad-blood-the-final-chapter&ign-itsct=pod_show_34_badblood&ign-itscg=80085" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">podcast</a> of the same name, or watch the documentary <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wtDaP18OGfw" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley</em></a>. <em>— MM</em></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TRAVEL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/eu-recommends-banning-unvaccinated-american-tourists-traveling-europe?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Fewer Americans in Paris
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/eu-recommends-banning-unvaccinated-american-tourists-traveling-europe?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Ratatouille rat looking at Eiffel Tower " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=277 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/AMKSRvfLEwXlu/giphy.gif?cid=ecf05e47sgdbaxmbqr0qetz2bi2x60vct5kf66rehb1y7n6q&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Ratatouille rat looking at Eiffel Tower " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/AMKSRvfLEwXlu/giphy.gif?cid=ecf05e47sgdbaxmbqr0qetz2bi2x60vct5kf66rehb1y7n6q&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g">
<!--<![endif]-->
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy/Pixar</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The European Council <a href="https://apnews.com/article/lifestyle-europe-business-health-travel-9c0f10f0af7e4d7fab63d6d8d4ed844c?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">removed</a> the US from the “safe list” of countries that can send tourists to the EU due to high Covid rates here in the States. It’s not quite as dramatic as it sounds, though.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>If you’re fully vaccinated, you probably don’t have to cancel your trip to Paris to watch Messi play—the EU’s </span><span><a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2021/08/30/eu-travel-restrictions/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">existing guidelines</a></span><span> allow countries to admit visitors who show proof of vaccination.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Plus, the 27 countries in the bloc don’t have to abide by the EU's guidance, because it's just a recommendation.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Still, one glance at declining airline stocks yesterday shows that investors fear the new policy could lead to billions in lost revenue for European businesses that rely on overseas visitors. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> Like the debate over what to call “soccer,” the US and the EU are also not on the same page when it comes to Covid travel restrictions. While the EU opened up its borders to American tourists in June, the US has yet to reciprocate for European visitors, angering the EU. <em>— NF</em></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GAMING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/china-limits-online-video-games-three-hours-week-minors?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
In China, Kids Aren't Left to Their Own Devices
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The Chinese government <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/china-sets-new-rules-for-youth-no-more-videogames-during-the-school-week-11630325781?mod=breakingnews" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">banned kids</a> under 18 from playing online video games on school nights and will allow gaming for only one hour a day on weekends and public holidays. What's next, a broccoli mandate? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The announcement, courtesy of the National Press and Publication Administration (NPPA), amounts to the strictest rules introduced yet to curb video game addiction among China's youth.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">So how will it be enforced? </strong>Parents aren't going to sit there with a stopwatch. All online video games are required to be connected to an “anti-addiction” system operated by the NPPA using real-name registration. Tencent, the world’s largest video game company by revenue, has already started using facial recognition technology to verify users. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why it matters: </strong>The latest ruling reflects China’s determination to reshape its tech industry over concerns that kids’ brains are turning into oatmeal. Earlier this month, an article in state media called video games “<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/03/beijing-calls-online-gaming-opium-mind-shares-tencent-plunge?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">opium for the mind</a>,” wiping off nearly $100 billion in value from gaming stocks. Tencent’s market cap has lost more than $400 billion since a February peak.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Want more? </strong>We made a funny (and weirdly emotional) <a href="https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMRBLRytJ/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">TikTok</a> about the news. <em>— SQ</em></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GRAB BAG
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/key-performance-indicators-august-31?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Key Performance Indicators
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>750,000 households in the US could <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-08-30/goldman-sees-750-000-evictions-in-u-s-as-bans-come-to-an-end?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">be evicted</a> by the end of 2021, Goldman Sachs wrote after the Supreme Court scrapped the CDC’s eviction moratorium. Up to 3.5 million households collectively owe landlords as much as $17 billion, Goldman calculated.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>“I got down on one knee and presented her the NFT and she started crying.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">One Redditor explained how he <a href="https://www.rareddit.com/r/relationships/comments/pebtdk?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">proposed to his fiancée</a> with an NFT instead of a ring—an NFT he spent almost his entire life savings on. She found the gesture non-fungible. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>Margaritaville and the myth of American leisure. (<a href="https://www.eater.com/22644505/margaritaville-times-square-new-york-hotel-restaurants?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Eater</a>)</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TECH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/fitness-wearable-company-whoop-raises-200-million-36-billion-valuation?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Whoop There It Is
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="fitness tracker" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC82NDU1L3dob29wX2JhbmRzLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Whoop</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">And by "it" we mean "massive funding round." Whoop, a startup that makes wearable health trackers, <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/f3dde553-0aa1-4137-bc50-093b1003fa71?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">raised</a> $200 million in a round led by SoftBank. Now valued at $3.6 billion, Whoop says it's the most valuable standalone human performance company in the world.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Similar to the Apple Watch, Whoop’s band tracks a user’s workouts, sleep, and movements, then gives advice on how to improve those behaviors on its app. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture</strong>: From startups to tech giants, companies are diving into the fitness tracker business, which is expected to reach $62 billion by 2023, according to Allied Market Research. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Apple CEO Tim Cook has high hopes for the Apple Watch and wants the company’s legacy to be in the areas of health and wellness. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Google completed a $2.1 billion deal this year to purchase the fitness-tracking company Fitbit. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Startups like Oura and Biofourmis, which both make wearable sensors, have also secured major funding over the past two years.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line</strong>: The funding will help Whoop compete with the Big Tech companies eyeing the space. <em>— SQ</em></p>

width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eLet’s welcome back our oldest friend: a celebrity trial. Jury selection \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/08/30/tech/elizabeth-holmes-theranos-trial/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebegins\u003c/a\u003e today for the criminal fraud trial of Elizabeth Holmes, the founder of shuttered Silicon Valley biotech startup Theranos. Holmes and her ex-boyfriend/business partner (we’ll unpack that in a minute) Ramesh “Sunny” Balwani could face up to 20 years in prison for perpetrating one of the biggest startup frauds in decades.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHere’s a quick timeline for everyone who was too young or busy in the aughts: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e2003:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e At the age of 19, Elizabeth Holmes dropped out of Stanford and started Theranos with the goal of revolutionizing blood testing.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e2015\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e: Theranos reached a $10 billion valuation by promising to perform 240+ tests with a single finger prick. Holmes’s net worth also grew to $4.5 billion, good enough for No. 1 on the Forbes list of America’s Richest Self-Made Women.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOctober 2015:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e The WSJ started digging around the company and published a bombshell \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/theranos-has-struggled-with-blood-tests-1444881901?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003einvestigation\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e into Theranos, claiming that the company’s linchpin machine couldn’t really do what was promised.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFrom there, investors started suing for fraud, the government yanked the company’s blood-testing license, and in September 2018, the SEC dissolved Theranos. Holmes was left with nothing but her black turtlenecks, two counts of conspiring to commit wire fraud, and 10 counts of federal wire fraud.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHolmes’s defense will try to prove that sure, maybe she ran a highly lucrative scam for over a decade, but she didn’t \u003cem\u003eknow\u003c/em\u003e it was a scam at the time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eHer legal strategy is basically to throw her former partner under the bus. Her defense \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/2021/08/28/1031961327/elizabeth-holmes-theranos-trial-boyfriend-balwani-emotional-sexual-abuse?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ealleges\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e that emotional and sexual abuse by Balwani impacted her state of mind during the time of the fraud. Balwani’s lawyers called the claims “deeply offensive.”\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e Holmes started Theranos at a time when venture capitalists were throwing money at young, public-facing tech founders who used the word “disrupt” a lot. The downfall of Theranos may have \u003ca href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2021/aug/30/elizabeth-holmes-trial-theranos-silicon-valley?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebriefly scared\u003c/a\u003e investors into looking closer at pitch decks, but it may take more than a conviction to change the Valley’s entrenched “fake it ’til you make it” mindset.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFall into a Theranos rabbit hole:\u003c/strong\u003e The WSJ reporter who broke the story, John Carreyrou, wrote a riveting book about the fraud called \u003ca href=\"https://bookshop.org/books/bad-blood-secrets-and-lies-in-a-silicon-valley-startup/9780525431992?aid=9879\u0026listref=brew-s-bookshelf\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eBad Blood\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e. You can also listen to a \u003ca href=\"https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bad-blood-the-final-chapter/id1575738174?mt=2\u0026ls=1\u0026cc=us\u0026id=1575738174\u0026urlDesc=%2Fbad-blood-the-final-chapter\u0026ign-itsct=pod_show_34_badblood\u0026ign-itscg=80085\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epodcast\u003c/a\u003e of the same name, or watch the documentary \u003ca href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wtDaP18OGfw\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eThe Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e. \u003cem\u003e— MM\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eremoved\u003c/a\u003e the US from the “safe list” of countries that can send tourists to the EU due to high Covid rates here in the States. It’s not quite as dramatic as it sounds, though.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIf you’re fully vaccinated, you probably don’t have to cancel your trip to Paris to watch Messi play—the EU’s \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2021/08/30/eu-travel-restrictions/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eexisting guidelines\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e allow countries to admit visitors who show proof of vaccination.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003ePlus, the 27 countries in the bloc don’t have to abide by the EU's guidance, because it's just a recommendation.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eStill, one glance at declining airline stocks yesterday shows that investors fear the new policy could lead to billions in lost revenue for European businesses that rely on overseas visitors. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e Like the debate over what to call “soccer,” the US and the EU are also not on the same page when it comes to Covid travel restrictions. While the EU opened up its borders to American tourists in June, the US has yet to reciprocate for European visitors, angering the EU. \u003cem\u003e— NF\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0\"\u003e\nGAMING\n\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003ch1 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/30/china-limits-online-video-games-three-hours-week-minors?email={{profile.email}}\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nIn China, Kids Aren't Left to Their Own Devices\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe Chinese government \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/china-sets-new-rules-for-youth-no-more-videogames-during-the-school-week-11630325781?mod=breakingnews\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebanned kids\u003c/a\u003e under 18 from playing online video games on school nights and will allow gaming for only one hour a day on weekends and public holidays. What's next, a broccoli mandate? \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe announcement, courtesy of the National Press and Publication Administration (NPPA), amounts to the strictest rules introduced yet to curb video game addiction among China's youth.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eSo how will it be enforced? \u003c/strong\u003eParents aren't going to sit there with a stopwatch. All online video games are required to be connected to an “anti-addiction” system operated by the NPPA using real-name registration. Tencent, the world’s largest video game company by revenue, has already started using facial recognition technology to verify users. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhy it matters: \u003c/strong\u003eThe latest ruling reflects China’s determination to reshape its tech industry over concerns that kids’ brains are turning into oatmeal. Earlier this month, an article in state media called video games “\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/08/03/beijing-calls-online-gaming-opium-mind-shares-tencent-plunge?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eopium for the mind\u003c/a\u003e,” wiping off nearly $100 billion in value from gaming stocks. Tencent’s market cap has lost more than $400 billion since a February peak.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWant more? \u003c/strong\u003eWe made a funny (and weirdly emotional) \u003ca href=\"https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMRBLRytJ/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eTikTok\u003c/a\u003e about the news. \u003cem\u003e—
